tool_description: An api that shows food recipes of Turkish cuisine
title: food recipe api

api_list.name: Get Recipes from a specific category
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all recipes belong to one category.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-recipe-api.p.rapidapi.com/recipes/{categoryname}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-recipe-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get Individual Recipe
api_list.description: This endpoint will return a specific meal recipe by Id
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-recipe-api.p.rapidapi.com/recipe/{recipeid}"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-recipe-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())

api_list.name: Get All Recipes
api_list.description: This endpoint will return all  All Meal Recipes from all categories.
api_list.code:
import requests

url = "https://food-recipe-api.p.rapidapi.com/recipes"

headers = {
    "X-RapidAPI-Key": "SIGN-UP-FOR-KEY",
    "X-RapidAPI-Host": "food-recipe-api.p.rapidapi.com"
}

response = requests.get(url, headers=headers)

print(response.json())
